body:
I'm pretty sure about these ones:

OS | arch
--- | ----
Windows | 386, amd64
Linux | 386, amd64, armv6l
Darwin | 386, amd64

Any others, someone will have to make an argument for.

FreeBSD? The runtime is not stable, so it shouldn't be considered first-class until [these issues](https://github.com/golang/go/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aissue%20is%3Aopen%20runtime%20label%3AOS-FreeBSD%20) are resolved.
